mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "userId", a.proc_def_id AS "procDefId", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.proc_def_name AS "procDefName", a.proc_ins_name AS "procInsName", a.task_name AS "taskName", createBy.name AS "createBy.name" FROM act_extension_cc a LEFT JOIN sys_user createBy ON createBy.id = a.create_by ${ew.customSqlSegment}
